content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":252892,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は圧倒的な数、ヘルマン軍は混乱している。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army has overwhelming numbers, and the Herman army is in confusion."},{"lineNumber":252893,"originalJapaneseLine":"特にこの方面には巨大な魔人バボラが攻め込んできており、戦う手段が無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Especially in this area, the giant demon Babora has invaded, and there is no way to fight him."},{"lineNumber":252894,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラに攻められては町や陣地を奪われるが、そのままでは押されまくるので","translatedEnglishLine":"If Babora attacks, towns and positions will be taken, but if we do nothing, we'll be thoroughly pushed back."},{"lineNumber":252895,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラがいなくなったら、即、アミトスの突撃で陣地を奪い返している","translatedEnglishLine":"When Babora is gone, Amitos immediately counterattacks to recapture the positions."},{"lineNumber":252896,"originalJapaneseLine":"一進一退をかろうじて維持している所","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a place where we barely maintain a see-saw battle."},{"lineNumber":252897,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝つ事は出来ない、だが負ける訳にはいかない、我々が引けば無防備な市民が魔軍の","translatedEnglishLine":"We cannot win, but we must not lose; if we retreat, defenseless citizens will be exposed to the demon army's..."},{"lineNumber":252898,"originalJapaneseLine":"攻撃にさらされてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"attacks."},{"lineNumber":252899,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラングバウはもう少しだ、魔軍が出るかもしれないので我が軍から護衛を付けて","translatedEnglishLine":"Langbau is just ahead; the demon army might come out, so I want to assign guards from our army."},{"lineNumber":252900,"originalJapaneseLine":"やりたいのだが、この状況だ、すまない。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'd like to, but given this situation, sorry."},{"lineNumber":252901,"originalJapaneseLine":"大丈夫だ、任せておけ。お前もがんばれよ","translatedEnglishLine":"It's okay, leave it to me. You do your best too."},{"lineNumber":252902,"originalJapaneseLine":"アミトスがランス達に足跡を見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Amitos shows Rance and the others the footprints."},{"lineNumber":252903,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン首都、ラングバウに到着した","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at Herman's capital, Langbau."},{"lineNumber":252904,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーラ、ペルエレ、クリーム、が出迎える。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheela, Peruere, and Cream greet them."},{"lineNumber":252905,"originalJapaneseLine":"クリームの状況説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Cream's status report."},{"lineNumber":252906,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このクエストの最初にしていますが、それと合わせて調整","translatedEnglishLine":"We started this quest earlier, but let's adjust according to that."},{"lineNumber":252907,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ピンチ、魔人はバボラ、ケッセルリンクの２体確認、押されている","translatedEnglishLine":"In a pinch; two demons, Babora and Kessel Link, have been confirmed; we're being pushed back."},{"lineNumber":252908,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ＪＡＰＡＮからは上杉軍２万が援軍として投入され助かっている","translatedEnglishLine":"20,000 Uesugi troops from JAPAN have been deployed as reinforcements and are helping us."},{"lineNumber":252909,"originalJapaneseLine":"他のヘルマン側のキャラは戦場で今も戦っている感じがいいです。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's good that the other Herman side characters still feel like they are fighting on the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":252910,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":252911,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人を倒すのがランスの任務。魔人はどこにいる？","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeating the demons is Rance's mission. Where are the demons?"},{"lineNumber":252912,"originalJapaneseLine":"こちらから見えますよと案内される、屋上か、見張り台みたいな所","translatedEnglishLine":"Guided to a place where they can be seen from here—like a rooftop or a watchtower."},{"lineNumber":252913,"originalJapaneseLine":"向こうですと方向を示される","translatedEnglishLine":"They point in that direction."},{"lineNumber":252914,"originalJapaneseLine":"数キロ、数十キロ先に魔人バボラが見える　身長５７ｍ","translatedEnglishLine":"Several kilometers, several tens of kilometers away, the demon Babora can be seen, standing 57 meters tall."},{"lineNumber":252915,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人バボラに向かって進撃だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Advance toward the demon Babora."},{"lineNumber":252916,"originalJapaneseLine":"移動中の会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation during the move."},{"lineNumber":252917,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういや、パットンが居ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Come to think of it, Patton isn't here."},{"lineNumber":252918,"originalJapaneseLine":"パットン、ハンティは少し前に聖魔教団の何かを見つけたという情報を得て","translatedEnglishLine":"Patton and Hunti learned some time ago they found something related to the Holy Demon Cult."},{"lineNumber":252919,"originalJapaneseLine":"探索に出かけたきり帰ってきていない","translatedEnglishLine":"They went out to investigate and haven't returned."},{"lineNumber":252920,"originalJapaneseLine":"あいつら、この俺様が忙しい時にイチャイチャ新婚旅行か！！","translatedEnglishLine":"Those guys, having a lovey-dovey honeymoon while I'm busy!!"},{"lineNumber":252921,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、上杉軍","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the Uesugi army."},{"lineNumber":252922,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信の戦い、ＪＡＰＡＮから派遣された上杉軍２万","translatedEnglishLine":"In Kenshin’s battle, 20,000 Uesugi troops dispatched from JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":252923,"originalJapaneseLine":"遊撃隊として魔軍と戦い続けていた。すでに魔物将軍を１体撃破している","translatedEnglishLine":"They have been fighting continuously as a guerrilla unit against the demon army, already defeating one demon general."},{"lineNumber":252924,"originalJapaneseLine":"愛、勝子、虎子　そのあたりもちょろっと見せて","translatedEnglishLine":"Briefly show Ai, Katsuko, and Torako around there."},{"lineNumber":252925,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス殿がこのヘルマンに来られたそうですよ。などの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversations like: 'Lord Rance has come to this Herman.'"},{ "lineNumber":252926,"originalJapaneseLine":"移動中の会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation during movement."},{"lineNumber":252927,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラが遠くに見える、だが・・近寄っても近寄っても遠くのまま","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora can be seen far away, but no matter how close we get, he still seems far off."},{"lineNumber":252928,"originalJapaneseLine":"あー、まだかよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, not yet, huh."},{"lineNumber":252929,"originalJapaneseLine":"後数キロありますね。見えているけど遠い","translatedEnglishLine":"There are still several kilometers left. We can see him but he's far away."},{"lineNumber":252930,"originalJapaneseLine":"if (確認(\"サテラが居る\")==1)","translatedEnglishLine":"if (Confirm(\"Satera is here\") == 1)"},{"lineNumber":252931,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラがバボラについて語ります","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera talks about Babora."},{"lineNumber":252932,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリス側の魔人、巨人　身長５７メートル","translatedEnglishLine":"A demon on the Cavebris side, a giant 57 meters tall."},{"lineNumber":252933,"originalJapaneseLine":"　興味ないのであまり知らない、たぶんバカだと思う","translatedEnglishLine":"Not very interested, so she doesn't know much; probably thinks he's an idiot."},{"lineNumber":252934,"originalJapaneseLine":"　直接戦った事は無い、サテラは嫌い、下品","translatedEnglishLine":"Never fought him directly. Satera dislikes him; thinks he's vulgar."},{"lineNumber":252935,"originalJapaneseLine":"諜報部隊でフレイアを見せておく","translatedEnglishLine":"Present Freya as part of the intelligence unit."},{"lineNumber":252936,"originalJapaneseLine":"積極的にヘルマン側に協力している様子、市民の保護などを中心に動く","translatedEnglishLine":"Actively cooperating with the Herman side, focusing on protecting civilians and such."},{"lineNumber":252937,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物隊長クラスは何名か暗殺に成功しているが、魔物将軍クラスはなかなか倒せない","translatedEnglishLine":"They have succeeded in assassinating several demon captains, but defeating demon generals is difficult."},{"lineNumber":252938,"originalJapaneseLine":"よくやってくれているありがとうとクリーム","translatedEnglishLine":"Cream says, 'Thank you for doing well.'"},{ "lineNumber":252939,"originalJapaneseLine":"組織の為よとフレイア、ま、人類が滅亡したらそんな事いってられないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Freya says, 'For the organization.' Well, if humanity perishes, I guess we can't say that."},{"lineNumber":252940,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃という感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, in the meantime."},{"lineNumber":252941,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物軍本陣、魔物大将軍ルメイ","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon army main camp, Demon Grand General Lumei."},{"lineNumber":252942,"originalJapaneseLine":"初登場、ルメイの紹介　","translatedEnglishLine":"First appearance, introducing Lumei."},{"lineNumber":252943,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスにより、ヘルマン方面征伐を任されたのは","translatedEnglishLine":"Tasked by Cavebris with subjugating the Herman front are..."},{"lineNumber":252944,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ケッセルリンクと魔人バボラだが、数十万の魔物を指揮するのは","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Kessel Link and demon Babora, but commanding hundreds of thousands of demons is..."},{"lineNumber":252945,"originalJapaneseLine":"この魔物大将軍ルメイ。性格、ホーネットとの戦いでの活躍とか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"This Demon Grand General Lumei. Personality, achievements in battles with Hornet, etc..."},{"lineNumber":252946,"originalJapaneseLine":"想像していたより人間共はしぶといが、ま、2ヶ月もしたら完全勝利だな","translatedEnglishLine":"Humans are more tenacious than imagined, but well, in about two months it'll be a complete victory."},{"lineNumber":252947,"originalJapaneseLine":"とか・・とにかくルメイを見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Something like that... Anyway, show Lumei."},{"lineNumber":252948,"originalJapaneseLine":"直轄の部隊にルメイ特別焼却師団が居る（兵数２万）","translatedEnglishLine":"Under direct command is Lumei's special incineration division (20,000 soldiers)."},{"lineNumber":252949,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは人間の村を襲っては一人残らず焼き殺す事を目的として設立された部隊","translatedEnglishLine":"This unit was established with the purpose of attacking human villages and burning everyone alive."},{"lineNumber":252950,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ１部隊しかないがいずれは何部隊も用意して人間共を殺していく計画","translatedEnglishLine":"Currently there is only one unit, but the plan is to prepare several units to kill humans."},{"lineNumber":252951,"originalJapaneseLine":"どしーん、バボラの足跡が聞こえ来た","translatedEnglishLine":"Thud, the footsteps of Babora were heard approaching."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は圧倒的な数、ヘルマン軍は混乱している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has overwhelming numbers, and the Herman army is in confusion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特にこの方面には巨大な魔人バボラが攻め込んできており、戦う手段が無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially in this area, the giant demon Babora has invaded, and there is no way to fight him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラに攻められては町や陣地を奪われるが、そのままでは押されまくるので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Babora attacks, towns and positions will be taken, but if we do nothing, we'll be thoroughly pushed back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラがいなくなったら、即、アミトスの突撃で陣地を奪い返している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Babora is gone, Amitos immediately counterattacks to recapture the positions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一進一退をかろうじて維持している所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a place where we barely maintain a see-saw battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝つ事は出来ない、だが負ける訳にはいかない、我々が引けば無防備な市民が魔軍の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We cannot win, but we must not lose; if we retreat, defenseless citizens will be exposed to the demon army's...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃にさらされてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウはもう少しだ、魔軍が出るかもしれないので我が軍から護衛を付けて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Langbau is just ahead; the demon army might come out, so I want to assign guards from our army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やりたいのだが、この状況だ、すまない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'd like to, but given this situation, sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫だ、任せておけ。お前もがんばれよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay, leave it to me. You do your best too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスがランス達に足跡を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amitos shows Rance and the others the footprints.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン首都、ラングバウに到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at Herman's capital, Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ、ペルエレ、クリーム、が出迎える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela, Peruere, and Cream greet them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリームの状況説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cream's status report.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このクエストの最初にしていますが、それと合わせて調整
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We started this quest earlier, but let's adjust according to that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピンチ、魔人はバボラ、ケッセルリンクの２体確認、押されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a pinch; two demons, Babora and Kessel Link, have been confirmed; we're being pushed back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮからは上杉軍２万が援軍として投入され助かっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 20,000 Uesugi troops from JAPAN have been deployed as reinforcements and are helping us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他のヘルマン側のキャラは戦場で今も戦っている感じがいいです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's good that the other Herman side characters still feel like they are fighting on the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を倒すのがランスの任務。魔人はどこにいる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeating the demons is Rance's mission. Where are the demons?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらから見えますよと案内される、屋上か、見張り台みたいな所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guided to a place where they can be seen from here—like a rooftop or a watchtower.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうですと方向を示される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They point in that direction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数キロ、数十キロ先に魔人バボラが見える　身長５７ｍ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several kilometers, several tens of kilometers away, the demon Babora can be seen, standing 57 meters tall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人バボラに向かって進撃だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Advance toward the demon Babora.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動中の会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation during the move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういや、パットンが居ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it, Patton isn't here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン、ハンティは少し前に聖魔教団の何かを見つけたという情報を得て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton and Hunti learned some time ago they found something related to the Holy Demon Cult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 探索に出かけたきり帰ってきていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They went out to investigate and haven't returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつら、この俺様が忙しい時にイチャイチャ新婚旅行か！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those guys, having a lovey-dovey honeymoon while I'm busy!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、上杉軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the Uesugi army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信の戦い、ＪＡＰＡＮから派遣された上杉軍２万
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Kenshin’s battle, 20,000 Uesugi troops dispatched from JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遊撃隊として魔軍と戦い続けていた。すでに魔物将軍を１体撃破している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have been fighting continuously as a guerrilla unit against the demon army, already defeating one demon general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛、勝子、虎子　そのあたりもちょろっと見せて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Briefly show Ai, Katsuko, and Torako around there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿がこのヘルマンに来られたそうですよ。などの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversations like: 'Lord Rance has come to this Herman.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動中の会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation during movement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラが遠くに見える、だが・・近寄っても近寄っても遠くのまま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora can be seen far away, but no matter how close we get, he still seems far off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あー、まだかよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, not yet, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後数キロありますね。見えているけど遠い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are still several kilometers left. We can see him but he's far away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("サテラが居る")==1)
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if (Confirm("Satera is here") == 1)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがバボラについて語ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera talks about Babora.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス側の魔人、巨人　身長５７メートル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A demon on the Cavebris side, a giant 57 meters tall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興味ないのであまり知らない、たぶんバカだと思う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not very interested, so she doesn't know much; probably thinks he's an idiot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直接戦った事は無い、サテラは嫌い、下品
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Never fought him directly. Satera dislikes him; thinks he's vulgar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 諜報部隊でフレイアを見せておく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Present Freya as part of the intelligence unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 積極的にヘルマン側に協力している様子、市民の保護などを中心に動く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actively cooperating with the Herman side, focusing on protecting civilians and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長クラスは何名か暗殺に成功しているが、魔物将軍クラスはなかなか倒せない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have succeeded in assassinating several demon captains, but defeating demon generals is difficult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくやってくれているありがとうとクリーム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cream says, 'Thank you for doing well.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 組織の為よとフレイア、ま、人類が滅亡したらそんな事いってられないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Freya says, 'For the organization.' Well, if humanity perishes, I guess we can't say that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃という感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, in the meantime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍本陣、魔物大将軍ルメイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon army main camp, Demon Grand General Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初登場、ルメイの紹介
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First appearance, introducing Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスにより、ヘルマン方面征伐を任されたのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tasked by Cavebris with subjugating the Herman front are...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクと魔人バボラだが、数十万の魔物を指揮するのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Kessel Link and demon Babora, but commanding hundreds of thousands of demons is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この魔物大将軍ルメイ。性格、ホーネットとの戦いでの活躍とか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This Demon Grand General Lumei. Personality, achievements in battles with Hornet, etc...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 想像していたより人間共はしぶといが、ま、2ヶ月もしたら完全勝利だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humans are more tenacious than imagined, but well, in about two months it'll be a complete victory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とか・・とにかくルメイを見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like that... Anyway, show Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直轄の部隊にルメイ特別焼却師団が居る（兵数２万）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Under direct command is Lumei's special incineration division (20,000 soldiers).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは人間の村を襲っては一人残らず焼き殺す事を目的として設立された部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This unit was established with the purpose of attacking human villages and burning everyone alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ１部隊しかないがいずれは何部隊も用意して人間共を殺していく計画
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently there is only one unit, but the plan is to prepare several units to kill humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どしーん、バボラの足跡が聞こえ来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thud, the footsteps of Babora were heard approaching.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":252892,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は圧倒的な数、ヘルマン軍は混乱している。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army has overwhelming numbers, and the Herman army is in confusion."},{"lineNumber":252893,"originalJapaneseLine":"特にこの方面には巨大な魔人バボラが攻め込んできており、戦う手段が無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Especially in this area, the giant demon Babora has invaded, and there is no way to fight him."},{"lineNumber":252894,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラに攻められては町や陣地を奪われるが、そのままでは押されまくるので","translatedEnglishLine":"If Babora attacks, towns and positions will be taken, but if we do nothing, we'll be thoroughly pushed back."},{"lineNumber":252895,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラがいなくなったら、即、アミトスの突撃で陣地を奪い返している","translatedEnglishLine":"When Babora is gone, Amitos immediately counterattacks to recapture the positions."},{"lineNumber":252896,"originalJapaneseLine":"一進一退をかろうじて維持している所","translatedEnglishLine":"This is a place where we barely maintain a see-saw battle."},{"lineNumber":252897,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝つ事は出来ない、だが負ける訳にはいかない、我々が引けば無防備な市民が魔軍の","translatedEnglishLine":"We cannot win, but we must not lose; if we retreat, defenseless citizens will be exposed to the demon army's..."},{"lineNumber":252898,"originalJapaneseLine":"攻撃にさらされてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"attacks."},{"lineNumber":252899,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラングバウはもう少しだ、魔軍が出るかもしれないので我が軍から護衛を付けて","translatedEnglishLine":"Langbau is just ahead; the demon army might come out, so I want to assign guards from our army."},{"lineNumber":252900,"originalJapaneseLine":"やりたいのだが、この状況だ、すまない。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'd like to, but given this situation, sorry."},{"lineNumber":252901,"originalJapaneseLine":"大丈夫だ、任せておけ。お前もがんばれよ","translatedEnglishLine":"It's okay, leave it to me. You do your best too."},{"lineNumber":252902,"originalJapaneseLine":"アミトスがランス達に足跡を見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Amitos shows Rance and the others the footprints."},{"lineNumber":252903,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン首都、ラングバウに到着した","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at Herman's capital, Langbau."},{"lineNumber":252904,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーラ、ペルエレ、クリーム、が出迎える。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheela, Peruere, and Cream greet them."},{"lineNumber":252905,"originalJapaneseLine":"クリームの状況説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Cream's status report."},{"lineNumber":252906,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このクエストの最初にしていますが、それと合わせて調整","translatedEnglishLine":"We started this quest earlier, but let's adjust according to that."},{"lineNumber":252907,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ピンチ、魔人はバボラ、ケッセルリンクの２体確認、押されている","translatedEnglishLine":"In a pinch; two demons, Babora and Kessel Link, have been confirmed; we're being pushed back."},{"lineNumber":252908,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ＪＡＰＡＮからは上杉軍２万が援軍として投入され助かっている","translatedEnglishLine":"20,000 Uesugi troops from JAPAN have been deployed as reinforcements and are helping us."},{"lineNumber":252909,"originalJapaneseLine":"他のヘルマン側のキャラは戦場で今も戦っている感じがいいです。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's good that the other Herman side characters still feel like they are fighting on the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":252910,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":252911,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人を倒すのがランスの任務。魔人はどこにいる？","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeating the demons is Rance's mission. Where are the demons?"},{"lineNumber":252912,"originalJapaneseLine":"こちらから見えますよと案内される、屋上か、見張り台みたいな所","translatedEnglishLine":"Guided to a place where they can be seen from here—like a rooftop or a watchtower."},{"lineNumber":252913,"originalJapaneseLine":"向こうですと方向を示される","translatedEnglishLine":"They point in that direction."},{"lineNumber":252914,"originalJapaneseLine":"数キロ、数十キロ先に魔人バボラが見える　身長５７ｍ","translatedEnglishLine":"Several kilometers, several tens of kilometers away, the demon Babora can be seen, standing 57 meters tall."},{"lineNumber":252915,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人バボラに向かって進撃だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Advance toward the demon Babora."},{"lineNumber":252916,"originalJapaneseLine":"移動中の会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation during the move."},{"lineNumber":252917,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういや、パットンが居ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Come to think of it, Patton isn't here."},{"lineNumber":252918,"originalJapaneseLine":"パットン、ハンティは少し前に聖魔教団の何かを見つけたという情報を得て","translatedEnglishLine":"Patton and Hunti learned some time ago they found something related to the Holy Demon JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":252923,"originalJapaneseLine":"遊撃隊として魔軍と戦い続けていた。すでに魔物将軍を１体撃破している","translatedEnglishLine":"They have been fighting continuously as a guerrilla unit against the demon army, already defeating one demon general."},{"lineNumber":252924,"originalJapaneseLine":"愛、勝子、虎子　そのあたりもちょろっと見せて","translatedEnglishLine":"Briefly show Ai, Katsuko, and Torako around there."},{"lineNumber":252925,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス殿がこのヘルマンに来られたそうですよ。などの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversations like: 'Lord Rance has come to this Herman.'"},{ movement."},{"lineNumber":252927,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラが遠くに見える、だが・・近寄っても近寄っても遠くのまま","translatedEnglishLine":"Babora can be seen far away, but no matter how close we get, he still seems far off."},{"lineNumber":252928,"originalJapaneseLine":"あー、まだかよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, not yet, huh."},{"lineNumber":252929,"originalJapaneseLine":"後数キロありますね。見えているけど遠い","translatedEnglishLine":"There are still several kilometers left. We can see him but he's far away."},{"lineNumber":252930,"originalJapaneseLine":"if (確認(\"サテラが居る\")==1)","translatedEnglishLine":"if (Confirm(\"Satera is here\") == 1)"},{"lineNumber":252931,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラがバボラについて語ります","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera talks about Babora."},{"lineNumber":252932,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリス側の魔人、巨人　身長５７メートル","translatedEnglishLine":"A demon on the Cavebris side, a giant 57 meters tall."},{"lineNumber":252933,"originalJapaneseLine":"　興味ないのであまり知らない、たぶんバカだと思う","translatedEnglishLine":"Not very interested, so she doesn't know much; probably thinks he's an idiot."},{"lineNumber":252934,"originalJapaneseLine":"　直接戦った事は無い、サテラは嫌い、下品","translatedEnglishLine":"Never fought him directly. Satera dislikes him; thinks he's vulgar."},{"lineNumber":252935,"originalJapaneseLine":"諜報部隊でフレイアを見せておく","translatedEnglishLine":"Present Freya as part of the intelligence unit."},{"lineNumber":252936,"originalJapaneseLine":"積極的にヘルマン側に協力している様子、市民の保護などを中心に動く","translatedEnglishLine":"Actively cooperating with the Herman side, focusing on protecting civilians and such."},{"lineNumber":252937,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物隊長クラスは何名か暗殺に成功しているが、魔物将軍クラスはなかなか倒せない","translatedEnglishLine":"They have succeeded in assassinating several demon captains, but defeating demon generals is difficult."},{"lineNumber":252938,"originalJapaneseLine":"よくやってくれているありがとうとクリーム","translatedEnglishLine":"Cream says, 'Thank you for doing well.'"},{ "lineNumber":252939,"originalJapaneseLine":"組織の為よとフレイア、ま、人類が滅亡したらそんな事いってられないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Freya says, 'For the organization.' Well, if humanity perishes, I guess we can't say that."},{"lineNumber":252940,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃という感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, in the meantime."},{"lineNumber":252941,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物軍本陣、魔物大将軍ルメイ","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon army main camp, Demon Grand General Lumei."},{"lineNumber":252942,"originalJapaneseLine":"初登場、ルメイの紹介　","translatedEnglishLine":"First appearance, introducing Lumei."},{"lineNumber":252943,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスにより、ヘルマン方面征伐を任されたのは","translatedEnglishLine":"Tasked by Cavebris with subjugating the Herman front are..."},{"lineNumber":252944,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ケッセルリンクと魔人バボラだが、数十万の魔物を指揮するのは","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Kessel Link and demon Babora, but commanding hundreds of thousands of demons is..."},{"lineNumber":252945,"originalJapaneseLine":"この魔物大将軍ルメイ。性格、ホーネットとの戦いでの活躍とか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"This Demon Grand General Lumei. Personality, achievements in battles with Hornet, etc..."},{"lineNumber":252946,"originalJapaneseLine":"想像していたより人間共はしぶといが、ま、2ヶ月もしたら完全勝利だな","translatedEnglishLine":"Humans are more tenacious than imagined, but well, in about two months it'll be a complete victory."},{"lineNumber":252947,"originalJapaneseLine":"とか・・とにかくルメイを見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Something like that... Anyway, show Lumei."},{"lineNumber":252948,"originalJapaneseLine":"直轄の部隊にルメイ特別焼却師団が居る（兵数２万）","translatedEnglishLine":"Under direct command is Lumei's special incineration division (20,000 soldiers)."},{"lineNumber":252949,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは人間の村を襲っては一人残らず焼き殺す事を目的として設立された部隊","translatedEnglishLine":"This unit was established with the purpose of attacking human villages and burning everyone alive."},{"lineNumber":252950,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ１部隊しかないがいずれは何部隊も用意して人間共を殺していく計画","translatedEnglishLine":"Currently there is only one unit, but the plan is to prepare several units to kill humans."},{"lineNumber":252951,"originalJapaneseLine":"どしーん、バボラの足跡が聞こえ来た","translatedEnglishLine":"Thud, the footsteps of Babora were heard approaching."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は圧倒的な数、ヘルマン軍は混乱している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has overwhelming numbers, and the Herman army is in confusion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特にこの方面には巨大な魔人バボラが攻め込んできており、戦う手段が無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially in this area, the giant demon Babora has invaded, and there is no way to fight him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラに攻められては町や陣地を奪われるが、そのままでは押されまくるので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Babora attacks, towns and positions will be taken, but if we do nothing, we'll be thoroughly pushed back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラがいなくなったら、即、アミトスの突撃で陣地を奪い返している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Babora is gone, Amitos immediately counterattacks to recapture the positions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一進一退をかろうじて維持している所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is a place where we barely maintain a see-saw battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝つ事は出来ない、だが負ける訳にはいかない、我々が引けば無防備な市民が魔軍の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We cannot win, but we must not lose; if we retreat, defenseless citizens will be exposed to the demon army's...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃にさらされてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウはもう少しだ、魔軍が出るかもしれないので我が軍から護衛を付けて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Langbau is just ahead; the demon army might come out, so I want to assign guards from our army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やりたいのだが、この状況だ、すまない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'd like to, but given this situation, sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫だ、任せておけ。お前もがんばれよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay, leave it to me. You do your best too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスがランス達に足跡を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amitos shows Rance and the others the footprints.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン首都、ラングバウに到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at Herman's capital, Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ、ペルエレ、クリーム、が出迎える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela, Peruere, and Cream greet them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリームの状況説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cream's status report.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このクエストの最初にしていますが、それと合わせて調整
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We started this quest earlier, but let's adjust according to that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピンチ、魔人はバボラ、ケッセルリンクの２体確認、押されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a pinch; two demons, Babora and Kessel Link, have been confirmed; we're being pushed back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮからは上杉軍２万が援軍として投入され助かっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 20,000 Uesugi troops from JAPAN have been deployed as reinforcements and are helping us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他のヘルマン側のキャラは戦場で今も戦っている感じがいいです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's good that the other Herman side characters still feel like they are fighting on the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を倒すのがランスの任務。魔人はどこにいる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeating the demons is Rance's mission. Where are the demons?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらから見えますよと案内される、屋上か、見張り台みたいな所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guided to a place where they can be seen from here—like a rooftop or a watchtower.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうですと方向を示される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They point in that direction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数キロ、数十キロ先に魔人バボラが見える　身長５７ｍ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several kilometers, several tens of kilometers away, the demon Babora can be seen, standing 57 meters tall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人バボラに向かって進撃だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Advance toward the demon Babora.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動中の会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation during the move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういや、パットンが居ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it, Patton isn't here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン、ハンティは少し前に聖魔教団の何かを見つけたという情報を得て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton and Hunti learned some time ago they found something related to the Holy Demon Cult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 探索に出かけたきり帰ってきていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They went out to investigate and haven't returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつら、この俺様が忙しい時にイチャイチャ新婚旅行か！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those guys, having a lovey-dovey honeymoon while I'm busy!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、上杉軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the Uesugi army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信の戦い、ＪＡＰＡＮから派遣された上杉軍２万
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Kenshin’s battle, 20,000 Uesugi troops dispatched from JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遊撃隊として魔軍と戦い続けていた。すでに魔物将軍を１体撃破している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have been fighting continuously as a guerrilla unit against the demon army, already defeating one demon general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛、勝子、虎子　そのあたりもちょろっと見せて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Briefly show Ai, Katsuko, and Torako around there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿がこのヘルマンに来られたそうですよ。などの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversations like: 'Lord Rance has come to this Herman.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動中の会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation during movement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラが遠くに見える、だが・・近寄っても近寄っても遠くのまま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Babora can be seen far away, but no matter how close we get, he still seems far off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あー、まだかよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, not yet, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後数キロありますね。見えているけど遠い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are still several kilometers left. We can see him but he's far away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("サテラが居る")==1)
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if (Confirm("Satera is here") == 1)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがバボラについて語ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera talks about Babora.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス側の魔人、巨人　身長５７メートル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A demon on the Cavebris side, a giant 57 meters tall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興味ないのであまり知らない、たぶんバカだと思う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not very interested, so she doesn't know much; probably thinks he's an idiot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直接戦った事は無い、サテラは嫌い、下品
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Never fought him directly. Satera dislikes him; thinks he's vulgar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 諜報部隊でフレイアを見せておく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Present Freya as part of the intelligence unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 積極的にヘルマン側に協力している様子、市民の保護などを中心に動く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actively cooperating with the Herman side, focusing on protecting civilians and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長クラスは何名か暗殺に成功しているが、魔物将軍クラスはなかなか倒せない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have succeeded in assassinating several demon captains, but defeating demon generals is difficult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくやってくれているありがとうとクリーム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cream says, 'Thank you for doing well.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 組織の為よとフレイア、ま、人類が滅亡したらそんな事いってられないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Freya says, 'For the organization.' Well, if humanity perishes, I guess we can't say that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃という感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, in the meantime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍本陣、魔物大将軍ルメイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon army main camp, Demon Grand General Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初登場、ルメイの紹介
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First appearance, introducing Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスにより、ヘルマン方面征伐を任されたのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tasked by Cavebris with subjugating the Herman front are...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクと魔人バボラだが、数十万の魔物を指揮するのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Kessel Link and demon Babora, but commanding hundreds of thousands of demons is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この魔物大将軍ルメイ。性格、ホーネットとの戦いでの活躍とか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This Demon Grand General Lumei. Personality, achievements in battles with Hornet, etc...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 想像していたより人間共はしぶといが、ま、2ヶ月もしたら完全勝利だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humans are more tenacious than imagined, but well, in about two months it'll be a complete victory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とか・・とにかくルメイを見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like that... Anyway, show Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直轄の部隊にルメイ特別焼却師団が居る（兵数２万）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Under direct command is Lumei's special incineration division (20,000 soldiers).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは人間の村を襲っては一人残らず焼き殺す事を目的として設立された部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This unit was established with the purpose of attacking human villages and burning everyone alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ１部隊しかないがいずれは何部隊も用意して人間共を殺していく計画
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently there is only one unit, but the plan is to prepare several units to kill humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どしーん、バボラの足跡が聞こえ来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thud, the footsteps of Babora were heard approaching.
